item.description:
Given the proximity of the Simulcast of the Startup Lessons Learned Conference on the 23rd to our regularly scheduled meetup we thought we'd mix it up this month and have an open coffee style get together.

In Cambridge - TBD Suggestions are welcome


The Agenda so far

* Round-table Introductions (20 mins)
* Lessons Learned from Lessons Learned Conference (20-30 mins)
* Tactical Chat: Review of your surveys, landing pages, and more (30
mins)
item.how_to_find_us: Check in at the front desk and come up to the 5th Floor
item.name: Lean Startup Circle Boston Monthly Meetup (Open Coffee)
